trends: There has been one other sighting in New Westminster
There were no other sightings in New Westminster on or around August 11th 2012
Summary: Triangle shaped object with 6 orange non bright lights
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a Triangle shaped object with 6 orange non bright lights. One o each corner. There was also a light within a circle and the circle was in the middle of the triangle. The object seemed almost transparent and was pretty large. I noticed it after following a satellite when it came into sight. It was moving faster then a plane in one direction. I watched it for about 5 secs before running inside to get my sister, within the 30 secs or less it took to get my sister it was gone.
